name: Generoc
description:
Feedback and bug reports are very much appreciated!

Controls:

WASD - Move camera
Right Click - Mine Block, Remove Dynamite, Crate
Left Click - Take Block (currently you can only take it if it is highlighted, left click to highlight)
1 - Place Grass
2 - Place Dirt
3 - Place Stone
4 - Place Dynamite                
5 - Drop a Crate
Hold Shift to continuously do these actions
Q - Detonate Dynamite (cursor on it)
C - Creative Mode (no limits for blocks)
F1 - Hide HUD
F3 - FPS and Debug Info



Trello: https://trello.com/b/jGcSJudN/generoc-trello
